monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Whenever this Monster receives a Buff, 55% chance to share the Buff with an allied Monster.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Aura: Every Monster in the party gains 1% Critical Chance for each Buff on it.

skills.name: Air Sickle
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Air Sickle Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 55% (220%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Air Sickle Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Air Sickle Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 70% (350%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Air Sickle Lvl 5
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Attack Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Attack value.

skills.name: Buff Catalyst
skills.description: Buffs are 20% more effective on this Monster.

skills.name: Buffing Restore
skills.description: When applying a Buff, 50% chance that a Debuff is removed.

skills.name: Center of Mass
skills.description: Multi-Target-Attacks deal 30% extra damage to the enemy with the highest Health. Multi-Target-Heals heal the ally with the lowest Health by 30% more.

skills.name: Channeling Sustain
skills.description: Unique Aura: Channel also heals your Monsters by 100% of this Monster's Max Mana at the start of every turn.

skills.name: Combo Buffing
skills.description: Every Buff action applies one additional random Buff.

skills.name: Crit Damage Focus
skills.description: Critical Damage values from equipment increased by 50%.

skills.name: Crit Damage Plus
skills.description: +15% Critical Damage

skills.name: Critical Consistency
skills.description: +10% Critical Damage. Critical Damage also increases non-Critical hits by 10% of the amount.

skills.name: Critical Defense
skills.description: Reduces damage taken by 10% of own Critical Damage value.

skills.name: Cyclone
skills.description: 2 x 75% (150%) physical damage (wind) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Cyclone Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) physical damage (wind) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Cyclone Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) physical damage (wind) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Dodging
skills.description: Increases chance to dodge enemy hits by 8%.

skills.name: Earth Weakness
skills.description: Earth damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Enlightened
skills.description: Whenever this Monster receives a Buff, 55% chance to share the Buff with an allied Monster.

skills.name: Explosion
skills.description: 1 x 220% physical damage (fire)

skills.name: Explosion Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 275% physical damage (fire)

skills.name: Explosion Lvl 3
skills.description: 1 x 340% physical damage (fire)

skills.name: Explosion Lvl 4
skills.description: 1 x 425% physical damage (fire)

skills.name: Explosion Lvl 5
skills.description: 1 x 530% physical damage (fire)

skills.name: Explosive Blast
skills.description: 1 x 165% physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Explosive Blast Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 220% physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Explosive Blast Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Fire Resistance
skills.description: Fire damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Giantsbane
skills.description: This Monster deals 5% more damage. Against enemies with a Health rating of 7 or higher, damage is increased by 20% instead.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Heroic Assault
skills.description: Aura: Every Monster in the party gains 1% Critical Chance for each Buff on it.

skills.name: Heroic Party
skills.description: Aura: Every Monster in the party deals 1% increased damage for each Buff on it.

skills.name: Martial Prowess
skills.description: Unique Aura: Whenever a Monster in the party evades a hit (either by dodging or by Blind), 70% chance that they gain a random Buff.

skills.name: Might
skills.description: Applies Might (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Mighty Boost
skills.description: Unique Aura: When an allied Monster gains Might, they gain a shield equal to 100% of their Attack and 1 harmful Stack is removed.

skills.name: Multi Channel
skills.description: Aura: Channel (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Multi Might
skills.description: Aura: Might (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Mythic
skills.description: Applies Glory, Channel & Regeneration (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Napalm
skills.description: 2 x 150% (300%) physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, 75% chance to apply Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Overcast
skills.description: Increases the Mana Cost of all attacks, healing and shielding actions by 10% and the power by 15%.

skills.name: Precision
skills.description: First hit of an ability has a 20% increased Critical Chance.

skills.name: Protector
skills.description: Aura: All Monsters in the party receive 7.5% less damage.

skills.name: Severe Cuts
skills.description: 6 x 65% (390%) physical damage (neutral) applies a stack of Wound.

skills.name: Severe Cuts Lvl 2
skills.description: 6 x 80% (480%) physical damage (neutral) applies a stack of Wound.

skills.name: Shroud
skills.description: Applies Spellshield (Buff) to whole party Applies Agility (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Shroud Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Spellshield (Buff) to whole party Applies Agility (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Shroud Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Spellshield & Agility (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Spellshield
skills.description: Applies Spellshield (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Typhoon Cut
skills.description: 6 x 90% (540%) physical damage (wind) applies Glory, Sidekick & Agility (Buffs) to itself

skills.name: Warcast
skills.description: Applies Might (Buff) to whole party Applies Channel (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Warcast Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Might (Buff) to whole party Applies Channel (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Warcast Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Might & Channel (Buffs) to whole party

drops.name: Ornate Pipe
drops.description: Attack +5 Crit Damage +10% Increases chance to dodge enemy hits by 5%.

drops.name: Reward Box lvl 1
drops.description: Consume to get a random item.
